name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReRe - Reset Review for GitHub Pull Request

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear All Viewed Files / Mark All Files Viewed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a small utility tool for developers collaborating on GitHub.

On GitHub's Pull Request, you can mark files as reviewed.
However, there is no way to reset it when you want to start the review again from the beginning.

With this extension, you will be able to clear the reviewed mark from the context menu.
You can also mark all files as reviewed.

Happy coding!

---

This Chrome extension is open source. The source code is available at the following link.

https://github.com/tnantoka/rere
